description:
Rocky has got to be one of the funniest guys I've ever worked with. I'm constantly amazed at what comes out of his mouth.
It took him a while to decide that he wanted to take the next step, but he finally arrived to do a video with Claude. Rocky said his girlfriend gave him her blessing.
I love the first part of this video because Rocky was really, really nervous and he talked
. The contrast between him and Claude (who was remarkably calm) was very interesting.
Claude really liked Rocky, as they had hung out the day before and had gotten to know each other. Claude asked Rocky (off camera and before the shoot) if he could eat out Rocky's ass. Rocky just kind of grinned and said "sure"...
title: Rocky & Claude
